name: Hot Seagulls in Your Area
description:
Releasing Aug. 28th, 2020 for $4.20

Stay tuned!!

You are a Bodybuilding Baywatch Babe.

You have been training all your life.

But you want to be stronger.

When you find a hell fiend within The Whistle of Ultimate Power, he offers to help you. But first, you must complete one task. Make every seagull on the boardwalk...

Smooch.

Point, click, and explore the boardwalk with your trusty basket, collecting seagulls. Using the seagulls you collect, test their love and let those floppy little dudes get it on.

Features:

  • A point-and-click overworld full of fun characters with strong personalities
  • A physics-based, QWOP-like smooching minigame full of floppy tongues and flappy wings
  • The opportunity to choose which gulls smooch, complete with individual backstories and descriptions
  • A deep story, deeper than any told before. This is truly the Citizen Kane of video games.
  • Collectable lipsticks to gussy up your gulls
  • Rich and meaningful dialogue
  • A cure for Baldness (not guaranteed)
  • Non-player characters that watch you as you walk around
  • A Galaga- style final boss where you Smooch Him

Follow us:

  • Wet Little Games @WetLittleTweets
  • Jen @SteamedBunnies
  • Leo @_Nardo23
  • Kirsten @mellontonin

Installation:

Windows:

  • Unzip file and Run application

Mac: 

  • Go to system preferences.
  • Open Security.
  • In General, change 'Allow apps downloaded from' to Anywhere.
  • If this doesn't work, go to the terminal and type sudo spctl --master-disable, type in password
  • Run application
